customizing_item_description: An outfit worn by Gley during night operations and medical treatments when she was the commander of the Medical Corps. The symbol of Albion is carved on it.
An outfit with a smell that repels insects in forests and swamps. Gley despises its smell as well.
A suit designed for operations in deserts or wastelands. It's made of specialized tear-proof materials that can withstand a sandstorm.
A specialized assassination suit that has been reinforced to reduce even more noise than the existing prosthetic body Sharen has been issued.
Specially painted to operate in snowfield zones, this specialized prosthetic body has a low-reflective surface that makes it hard to see even in direct sunlight.
This suit is designed for cases where maximum firepower is needed on the vast battlefield.
The suit is Sharen's usual nighttime outfit, but it has basic features that allow her to immediately carry out an assassination operation in cases of emergency.
An outfit painted with a special camouflage pattern to operate in bushy areas.
In order to function in the desert and wasteland zones, Blair's outfit has been painted with a desert camouflage pattern.
This specialized suit was created with the technical help from the Magisters to make handling dangerous fires safer.
Blair's combat suit, made of red leather, is rumored to be nicknamed the Demon of the Battlefield by the Vulgus.

The suit of choice on a melancholy day. If you see Valby wandering around in a dark and gloomy suit looking like she's about the burst into tears, it's a good idea to ask how she is doing and cheer her up.
Specialized technology was patterned and inscribed onto the suit to help liquify Valby more smoothly.
For Valby, whose wish was to wear a leather jacket like Freyna's, the Magisters connected hoses between Valby and her leather suit.
The suit was developed after teammates suggested that it was difficult to distinguish between Valby and water from a distance. Valby calls it Baby Bird.
A new suit supplemented with a powerful heat dissipation treatment to ensure it can operate in desert zones.
There were whispers that no one was able to find Kyle at that time since he was in his specially painted suit, which completely camouflaged him for operations in swamp zones.
A suit painted jet-black for Kyle, whenever he needs to move for an operation in the dead of night when everything is still.
A suit reinforced with special magnetic minerals to make it easier to control magnetic forces.
After taking down enemies with impressive chain explosions, Esiemo returned to Albion as a hero.
Esiemo's explosions do not stop even in the desert. However, to avoid detection by enemies, camouflage patterns were applied to the suit.
A suit created with the inspiration of the bright stars seen during night operations.
Enzo liked the color of the sky tinged with red around the setting sun. He said it evoked a feeling of awe mixed with sadness.
A suit resembling the color of Kuiper ore. For Enzo, who usually wears bright clothes, this is quite a bold attempt.
A suit worn when Enzo needs to personally search for injured soldiers on the battlefield. It would be problematic if even a Medical Officer gets captured.
A suit worn during battles in snowy fields to rescue soldiers suffering from hypothermia or frostbite. The color is suitable for blending into the white snow.
Seeing Yujin's wardrobe filled with dark-colored clothes, Gley and Valby decided to dye them to look brighter. Yujin warned them never to touch his wardrobe again.
It wasn't just one suit that Gley and Valby changed the color of. Yujin screamed in anger. Eventually, the two were banned from accessing not only Yujin's wardrobe but his quarters entirely.
A suit that indicates Luna is in high spirits. When she wears this suit, her mood is at its peak.
A dedicated suit reminiscent of red beats. It complements Luna's skills well.
A suit made of a material that sparkles in the light. Be careful of the overwhelming speaker volume that resonates in your head.

A suit designed to protect Lepic and his Arche Drive 44 from the elements. The suit's appearance resembles that of the 'Reaper' from the old Ingris texts, hence its nickname, 'Reaper of the Battlefield.'
Designed for use in extremely hazardous zones, the suit was given an unusual nickname because some people teased that it looked like an infected test subject of the Vulgus.
Reborn as an Ultimate, Lepic shone brightly. Lepic called himself the 'Sun Guardian.'
This suit is the result of a project experimenting with equipping an enhanced shield to better absorb the enemy's attack but has not been used in action.
This suit is inspired by the so-called knights who defended their kingdom during the first invasion of Vulgus in the distant past.
Reborn as an Ultimate, Ajax seemed to have a complete understanding of the subspace and dimension of the Void.
The theme of this equipment is based on the equipment Viessa had when she was an informant for a criminal organization within Albion's underworld.

A suit with a refrigerant-releasing function, created when the Ultimate Project was in full swing. However, its specifications were insufficient to handle Ultimate Viessa's enhanced Arche, and it was reworked into a decorative suit. Though it is only decorative, the honor and value of the Ancestors' legacy will live on.
Dominator of the Cold, Ultimate Viessa, who boasts command of unmatched Glacial Energy.
A full-body suit that includes a storage circulator to store the excess electrical energy generated by Bunny's body so that it can be reused as a resource.
A suit specially requested by Bunny, who has always been a fan of cute things. There are no other special feature aside from its cute design.
A specially designed suit that has a neural network attached to the entire body to maximize remote control capability. Being somewhat heavy it is main disadvantage.
The suit was developed with improved visibility in the dark for nighttime operations. Jayber was directly involved in its development.

A special outfit Blair, Lepic, and Esiemo, aka the Fire Guys, gave to Jayber as a gift. As soon as he heard the name "Explosive Presence," he made a face and refused. However, Esiemo grabbed him and Lepic and Blair forced him to wear it. Although Jayber was dumbfounded, the Fire Guys were quite satisfied.

An infiltration bio-suit created based on DNA samples from the Vulgus Order of Truth. Designed to subvert the Vulgus' biometric authentication system, most of the DNA samples were obtained by Freyna during her mission.

After the Room 0 Incident, Freyna was quarantined for a long time for being unable to control her Arche. When the toxin in her Arche was finally neutralized, a prototype suit was made, and Freyna was released from the isolation unit.
An exclusive suit for Gley based on descriptions of 'vampires' in ancient texts. Her bloodless face and cold expression inspire fear in the beholder.
After having been kidnapped by the Vulgus, various experiments left Gley neither human nor Vulgus. Her suit contains a restraint feature to keep her at bay when she's Frenzied.

A specialized suit designed for Gley who quenches her rage-induced thirst by taking her enemies' lives. It was designed to reduce her thirst by letting the stolen life remain in her body for an extended period of time.
The special outfit worn by Colon Special Forces when out on operations. But for Sharen, this outfit has a number of unique gadgets specifically for her.

A suit that applies the Colon Special Forces' uniform worn by Sharen before the accident, to her Arche Drive body prosthetic. Anais claims it was made for her to wear to formal occasions, but she actually made it as a reminder of Sharen's life before the accident. Recognizing her intent, Sharen treasures the suit.
A suit that was completed with the technical help of the Magisters to improve the burn but is often used for barbecuing.
Out on the town at night to blow some steam after his missions, Blair is often mistaken to be the Dominator of the Dark Streets, thanks to the way he dresses.
An exploration suit developed for deep-sea Void Erosion investigations. It has been reinforced throughout to withstand high water pressure.
The suit was created at the request of Valby, after seeing a frog move between water and land and thinking it resembled her. She was happy to receive the suit from the Magisters.

This suit was developed after the Agna Desert Operation to honor the memory of the members of the Construction Corps. The Magisters voiced their concerns about its clunky design and prioritization of mobility over stability, but he ignored them. Contrary to the Magisters' fears, both the helmet and suit proved to be extremely stable. The skills of an experienced technician who led the Construction Corps are still on display even as a Descendant.
This special ops suit was created after Kyle and the Construction Corps were almost swept away by a sandstorm while they were trying to set up camp in the desert zone.
An outfit designed by Esiemo himself to evoke an explosion large enough to be seen from even Albion and instill terror into the Vulgus.
A specialized suit created to enhance situational awareness on the battlefield. The effort put into it to relieve Luna's alertness is abundantly apparent.
Luna always has to be the center of attention at pool parties. The suit features a daring bikini and a bolero-style top. The speakers, even customized in color for the party, are impressive.

This unique suit of the Ultimate gear incorporate the legacy of the Ancestors in their distinctive design. The new technology of the Magisters was applied more than the legacy of the Ancestors. As an Ultimate-exclusive suit, it was created with fibers made of highly conductive specialized materials. Bunny loved its tidy appearance.

Enzo, a bird enthusiast, collaborated with the Magisters to create a full-body suit specifically tailored to his interests. The suit utilizes Nano Tubes and a lightweight specialized Kuiper material, ensuring both durability and mobility. Enzo focused on functionality while also wanting the suit to resemble a white hawk in appearance.

Enzo wears this special operation suit when he needs to focus on combat rather than supply. This suit boasts a pattern designed to prevent enemies from spotting you and has a bulletproof vest equipped with kuiper fibers.

A suit for carrying out night operations and engaging in combat. Specialized kuiper fibers and a nano tubes have been applied, making it incredibly durable and designed to fully protect Yujin's body. When worn with a helmet, it resembles a nightmarish soldier.

Found in a glacial cave, this Ultimate equipment was so damaged that it was unusable. Although the restoration was almost abandoned halfway through because of the difficulty, the restoration continued upon Viessa's comment that she liked this equipment because of the design. The superalloy thorns jutting out all over the body are a distinctive feature of this equipment. The reason for them remains a mystery.

A suit designed for Gley, who has been deployed to the Vulgus Slaughter Operation. For missions that involve ambushing enemies at sunset, a specialized substance that absorbs and reflects sunlight was used to maximize efficiency.

A suit that was one of the prototypes when the "Indomitable Knight," a Unique Equipment for Ultimate Lepic, was being implemented. Made with carbon fiber and carbon steel painted in luxuriant navy blue. Gorgeously decorated in gold, a distinctive characteristic of an Ultimate Descendant's equipment, and the ornament on the right shoulder was customized for the mobile infantry system.

A luxurious bodyarmor made to respect Ultimate Ajax's strong and determined belief: "No matter how sturdy the armor may be, it crumbles when something you want to protect disappears." the golden steel, a feature of an Ultimate Descendant's equipment, and carbon steel painted in white are the distinct characteristics.

Focused on being extremely lightweight, Ultimate Bunny's suit is vulnerable to damage during a critical situation. To prevent this, a suit was designed to cover the whole body with carbon fiber. In order to maintain Bunny's high speed, which leverages the advantage of extreme lightness, ion engines have been installed on the arms, legs, and back.

The universe was an unknown space surrounding the Ingris planet before the Void Area existed. A spacesuit was prepared for reaching that universe. Yujin was overwhelmed by the arcane and wonderful space.

It is quite unlikely that anybody survived the tremendous explosion that occurred. Nevertheless, Esiemo emerged from that blast with a sense of pride. He allegedly donned a suit made from a variety of specialized fire-resistant materials that had extremely low heat conductivity. As a result, Esiemo returned unscathed.

One of the suits created during the development of the exclusive Ultimate Equipment 'Sea of Emerald' and is characterized by its intense red color. The water pressure regulator on the suit is linked to the helmet, responding to even the slightest changes in pressure.
Hailey's operations uniform when she was deployed to the southern front, which is made up of wetlands. Since the humidity in the region is high, it is made of new material that is very breathable.
A military uniform worn at the time of deployment to the Void Fragment Destruction Operation. Originally white, its color changed after reacting to the Void Energy.
The full-dress uniform of the Albion Sniper Squad that Hailey received before she became a Descendant. It is made from a sturdy material that doesn't easily wrinkle to maintain neatness.

The suit Freyna wears on toxic plant disposal missions. The suit's surface area has been minimized to avoid getting caught in the thorny vines, but the shielding performance from its hands and respiratory system have been enhanced to provide better protection against toxins.

As Bunny became a Descendant after causing an accident, she had to take on policing duties for a while after completing her crime prevention training. The special suit she wore was made of a new material optimized for her Speed of Light. The parts that serve as warning lights are powered by her electric Arche.

A specialized suit made by analyzing the technology applied to the Order of Truth priest, Nazeistra. It is attached with a cryogenic cooler that is linked to Hailey's pulse and Arche. The spikes on the suit serve as a kind of cooling devices as well as a means of protection from enemy attack.

Ever since the Room 0 Incident, Freyna has avoided going to the Echo Swamp for Operations. The voices of her trauma, haunt her like echoes. But she's determined to face her pain, so she dons a new suit and heads to Echo Swamp with renewed resolve.

A suit specialized for search Operations in the Sterile Land. The overall color scheme was adjusted to match the terrain and features of the Sterile Land and to hide inside the Vulgus Munitions Factory.
A suit with a pattern optimized for operations in swamps filled with dense greenery. The fabric is breathable to help withstand the humidity of the swamp.
The suit visualizes the exaltation Keelan feels in battle. It captures the excitement and exhilaration of combat and his passion for competition.

Sharen's suit that was designed for the perfect assassination. It's made of highly elastic and resilient piezoelectric materials and electrorheological fluids for perfect mobility and maximum efficiency.

The most recent model of the "Raley Battlesuit," a specialized piece of Void exploration equipment optimized for Keelan's Arche. It is based on the battlesuit worn by Ajax who was once adrift in the Void Abyss, and currently has the highest Void Energy defenses. The suit is constructed entirely of metals with Void Energy wavelength canceling properties and dense Kuiper to withstand external impacts when exploring Void Vessels.
A bodysuit inspired by the light of Ines' plasma Arche abilities. It is made from a composite of Kuiper particles bonded to a polymer matrix, giving it strength and durability as well as elasticity.
A bodysuit inspired by Ines' combat style, of snaring her enemies with unrelenting lightning. It is characterized by its bright glow, even in the dark.

The extremely lightweight version of the "Raley Battlesuit," a specialized piece of Void exploration equipment. The Raley Battlesuit is based on the battlesuit worn by Ajax who was once adrift in the Void Abyss, and currently has the highest Void Energy defenses. It is also synchronized with the Call Spark System, which automatically adjusts to prevent the high levels of heat energy generated by Ines' Arche abilities from rising above a certain level.

A suit made for Blair, the hottest chef in Albion, no, in Ingris. When Blair saw the first prototype, his feedback was "it lacks heat." Grown sick of Blair's vague criticism, Jayber told him to "Get out of my lab, you demon." Hearing that, Blair cheered, "Demon? Yes, that's it!" Jayber looked at Blair jumping with joy and grudgingly put a Thermal Energy Circulation System which looked like a demon tail on Blair's suit, then kicked him out.
Gley, roaming the battlefield dressed in red, was like the Grim Reaper spreading the Red Plague.
The suit Valby wears when fighting fires. Unlike conventional suits, it is made of a special fiber that is nonflammable.

A reinforced exoskeleton nun's habit worn by Serena, an early Descendant who was active during the Apocalypse. It has an attached midair maneuvering deployment device that ionizes her Arche to provide propulsion. Despite being a powerful piece of equipment, it requires agility and spatial perception beyond that of a human, making it Serena's de facto Exclusive Equipment.
Gley's favorite outfit from her days as "Professor Elias." With her hope restored, Gley passed on her Medical Corps coat to Yujin and changed into something more familiar and comfortable.
A highly elastic suit created for Hailey who uses an Anti-materiel Sniper Cannon. It is made of specially processed Kuiper polymer fibers, which provide elasticity as well as strength and durability.

A specially crafted uniform for Albion officers to wear during field operations. It emphasizes mobility and comfort, ensuring even Executive Officers with limited field experience can operate without hindrance.

A special suit issued for high-intensity training in H.O.U.N.D. Made to fit tightly against the body to absorb sweat and release body heat. Keelan rarely wears his, saying the skin-tight material makes him uncomfortable.
A low-visibility field uniform worn by HQ staff. Beyond visibility control, it's made with anti-reflective, flame-resistant fabric to counter a wide range of Vulgus surveillance sensors.

A uniform issued to Operations Executive Officers at HQ. Based on Albion's standard military uniform, it includes a range of equipment such as a comms device mount and standard issue handgun holster, along with a crisp shirt.

An outfit themed around Luna's new album track, "Moonlight Stage." While it was supposedly made for a group of special fans, due to the Albion Headquarters' involvement in its production and the suspiciously high-grade bulletproof fabric used, not to mention its optimization for Luna's Arche, it's speculated that these "special fans" might actually be the Vulgus.

Serena's Exclusive Equipment based on the transcendent beings known as "angels" from ancient Ingris folklore. The angels in the tales were described as awe-inspiring yet fearsome beings with multiple layers of wings and gleaming eyes, all characteristics that match Serena, the winged Descendant who inspires fear in enemies and awe in allies. This newly refined "angel," recreated by human hands, was immediately issued to Serena and together are creating new legends for future generations.

A special suit for Construction Corps crews deployed on offshore bases and plant construction sites. This work suit is unique in that it has a larger skin exposure compared to other suits, allowing for easy dissipation of heat while working under the midday sun. A special sonic emitter attached near the ankles serves to repel dangerous predators lurking beneath the sea surface.

The work clothes Harris wore before she became a Descendant. They were made from durable, contamination-resistant fabric for frequent heavy-duty work. The design has been personally altered by Harris.

Special deep-sea exploration gear that only Valby can wear. Thanks to Valby's unique Arche properties, it can withstand the extreme water pressure of the deep sea. If anyone else were to wear it, it would likely be crushed instantly, leaving no trace.

A suit designed for exploring Void Space. Originally intended as a new Void Abyss exploration suit for H.O.U.N.D., it was modified to suit Nell's ability to harness the energy of the Dimensional Breach as the need for research and exploration of the Breaches increased.

A suit that pushes stability and portability to the extreme. Seeing Yujin repeatedly getting injured during reckless rescue operations in dangerous zones frustrated Deslin, who spared what little time he could from his busy schedule to create it. Yujin's emergency rescue success rate increased drastically following its development, making the suit Yujin's most cherished piece of equipment.

This Obliviant Commander equipment was acquired while rescuing Dia. As it was reconstructed using Albion's Arche Tech after analysis and verification of Vulgus technology, it can be considered to be based on fundamentally different technology.

A specialized suit worn to maximize the effects of the medical pod. It incorporates energy activator technology at the cellular level to promote continuous regeneration, aiding the rapid recovery of patients in critical condition requiring intensive care.

Riding attire made for Dia, who was an outstanding cadet with exceptional skills at the military academy. Rumor has it many cadets admired Dia, who rode her horse at a gallop wearing the academy's distinctive red rider attire.

Bunny hosted a pajama party. Lepic prepared a pair of dinosaur pajamas for everyone, since he's so excited to have a get-together after such a long time. The tail may not look like it, but it's more comfortable than expected.
A long-awaited vacation! We'll be going to Ingris Beach! Let's all wear cool swimsuits that fit the sunny, beautiful beach and jump into the water!

Outfit for the Oasis Party, a whirlpool event that began as a Descendant combat fatigue recovery program. HQ wants this to be an occasion where everyone can relax, like an oasis in the desert, so they've lifted some of the dress code restrictions.

Gley's suit resembles the color of the thick haze that settles in the swamp at dawn. The cool colors fit Gley's demeanor well.

A hunter's mask embroidered with mischievously grinning pumpkin. The Pumpkin Hunter, who always appears around this time of the year, said he was going to see the Vulgus to go trick-or-treating, then would disappear into the battlefield, laughing impishly.
A specialized outfit created in Albion to celebrate the interception of the Colossus, Lava Citadel. It clearly reflects external features of the Lava Citadel.
A replica of an actual Reactor that boosts the Arche output of Descendants. If this Reactor was miniaturized and linked to each Arche type, it could become an actual Reactor used on the battlefield.

An early version of the Ecive terminal that was distributed to Descendants when Ecive communication was first developed. It is now mostly used as an ornament, but to Serena, it is still a cutting-edge electronic device.

The fire brigade task force, which deals with fire accidents in Albion, wears this fire-retardant gear. Created with specialized fire-resistant glass, it allows the fire brigade to put out fires safely even at high temperatures.
A specialized outfit created in Albion to celebrate the interception of the Colossus, Lava Citadel. It clearly reflects external features of the Lava Citadel.

A holographic ornament from Luna's smaller band "Full Moon." It represents the new moons coming together to form a full moon.
A specialized outfit created in Albion to celebrate the interception of the Colossus, Lava Citadel. It clearly reflects external features of the Lava Citadel.

A veil worn by those who served the "Dominator" of the Vulgus. They were brainwashed by the Vulgus of the Order of Truth. Thanks to the Descendants, all of them have been rescued and are receiving treatment.
A specialized outfit created in Albion to celebrate the interception of the Colossus, Lava Citadel. It clearly reflects external features of the Lava Citadel.

A symbol presumed to be the unit mark of the Vulgus version of Descendants, the "Obliviants". To humanity, Arche is a symbol of hope. So, to see Mastery Rank, its measure of strength, alongside the eerily engraved emblem, evokes complex emotions about the Obliviants.
"Want some candy?" A mask with an impish smile, as well as a dress with a cute, but creepy, vibe. Taking the candy she gives you and keeping it is probably a good idea.

Although this exploration device is commonly called a compass, developers under the Technology Development Department insist on the name Ultra-Powerful Magnetic Field Detector.
A hairnet given to those who volunteered to help the Albion Medical Corps. It is used to distinguish the Medical Corps from reinforcements.
This pair of portable hydraulic pliers is an essential tool for the Construction Corps. Thanks to its free-moving joints, this tool can handle all sorts of tasks.

Safety glasses to protect his eyes from sandstorms.
With full coverage, it protects the respiratory tract and mucous membranes from exposure to toxins.
Featuring a skull motif, this mask is unique to the 44th Grenadiers.
An electronic shield that is attached to the face instead of the normal battlesuit, making it lighter and easier to breathe, but DEF effect is still effective.
A helmet made by fusing the Grave Walker's nerve cells. It was created during an experiment to fuse the Colossus' Void Energy with Descendant exclusive equipment.
A helmet made of substances discovered by Ajax who was adrift in the Void space. Its actual materials are unknown.
A helmet made by Ajax designed with dimensional fissure patterns inscribed on it.
A prototype version of the Raley Mk. 5, a Void Exploration Exclusive Equipment. It is painted in bright yellow to indicate it is a prototype.
A piece of equipment customized for Viessa using Ice. The thermal imaging helps her detect enemies.
Specialized goggles with added detection capabilities for prolonged missions to exterminate the Vulgus.
Custom-made for the super fast Bunny, the mask features a device to keep out particulates as well as a cute space-bun hairstyle.
A helmet requested by Bunny, who has a need for speed, to be customized to her liking. It's said to have a bat motif.
A new helmet that gives Bunny the ability to control her speed when moving at high speeds.
Bunny's new helmet is packed with cutting-edge technology to help her run faster.
This helmet is designed to make Bunny more mobile, as she often uses her quick legs to take on transport missions on the battlefield.
It contains Bunny's desire to be able to freely travel one day across dimensions in a world without Vulgus and Colossi.
Although the new helmet is loaded with various experimental technologies, Bunny has not been able to take full advantage of them because she never reads the manual.
Even when Jayber is unable to see, it sends visual information about his surroundings directly to his retinas.
The gas mask protects against a wide range of toxic substances, but since the eyes are exposed, it does not offer total protection.
One of Jayber's secret hobbies is collecting insects.
Headgear in a color combination Jayber has favored since childhood, when he was called a genius.
A mask exclusive to Freyna, decorated by her as a way to deal with her anxiety.
A helmet worn to protect the respiratory system in zones corrupted by decay. Even for Freyna, who is resistant to all poisons, prolonged exposure is dangerous.
A pair of sunglasses and earrings that Dr. Kate gave Freyna as presents, so that she could enjoy her first holiday outside since leaving quarantine.
These goggles have a variety of sensors built in to recognize Life Spheres.
The mask worn when she was a test subject for the Vulgus. She keeps it as a constant reminder.
The use of mainly silver, which has very high conductivity, allows Sharen to maximize her Arche abilities.
Goggles equipped with a system that enables tracking enemies in the dark. Mainly used for nighttime operations or infiltration into narrow indoor areas.
Specially painted for operations in snowfield zones, this specialized helmet has a low-reflective surface that makes it hard to see even in direct sunlight.
The helmet is part of Sharen's usual nighttime outfit, but it has basic features that allow her to immediately carry out assassinations in urgent situations.
A hat and mask that were given out at an event at the Brown Beard Pub and something Blair especially cherishes.
A hairstyle Blair tried for a while at the behest of his ex-girlfriend, but after breaking up with her, he went back to his original style.
The incident of Blair sneakily stealing and wearing the eyepatch Alpha was using while his prosthetic eye was being repaired is still much talked about.
Developed for Valby who wants more water supplied faster during operations.
The helmet is shaped to maximize UV protection to help Valby better manage hydraulic pressure and moisture.
This helmet has been treated with a special paint to hide the water that even reflects under moonlight.

The helmet of choice on a melancholy day. If you see Valby wandering around in a dark and gloomy suit and helmet looking like she's about the burst into tears, it's a good idea to ask how she is doing and cheer her up.
Specialized technology was patterned and inscribed onto this helmet to help Valby enter Liquefied state more smoothly.
A helmet long-sought-after by Valby that goes well with her leather suit. Valby absolutely loves this helmet.
The helmet was developed after teammates suggested that it was difficult to distinguish between Valby and water from a distance. Valby calls it Baby Bird.
The appearance of an aged Kyle, his unkempt hair and beard unchanged.
Every now and then, Kyle appears with a bandana around his head which he wore during his Construction Corps days. When someone asks him why, he just says, "It's comfortable, that's all."
The ocu-scope he used to put on when checking designs that required precision during his Construction Corps days.
A pair of sunglasses Esiemo likes to put on when he craves to torment enemies with explosions.
Enzo actually hates strong sunlight. He wears these sunglasses to block it out, but he chose his favorite pilot design.
Surgical glasses made by the Magisters. They are essential for delicate surgeries.
Headgear for the Medical Corps with a separate channel so as not to overlap with other communication channels. Mainly used in emergency rescue operations.
When Luna encountered a white-eyed mouse in the Albion Mountains, she fell in love with it and asked the Magisters to make a headset for her that looks just like it.
A new double part hairstyle Luna is sporting after growing out her hair. She wears a shining neon cat-eared headset for a pop of color.

A helmet designed to protect Lepic and his Arche Drive 44 from the elements. The suit's appearance resembles that of the 'Reaper' from the old Ingris texts, hence its nickname, 'Reaper of the Battlefield.'
Designed for use in extremely hazardous zones, the suit was given an unusual nickname because some people teased that it looked like an infected test subject of the Vulgus.
Reborn as an Ultimate, Lepic shone brightly. Lepic called himself the 'Sun Guardian.'
This suit is the result of a project experimenting with equipping an enhanced shield to better absorb the enemy's attack but has not been used in action.
This suit is inspired by the so-called knights who defended their kingdom during the first invasion of Vulgus in the distant past.
Reborn as an Ultimate, Ajax seemed to have a complete understanding of the subspace and dimension of the Void.
The theme of this equipment is based on the equipment Viessa had when she was an informant for a criminal organization within Albion's underworld.

A cryogenic helmet created when the Ultimate Project was in full swing. However, its specifications were insufficient to handle Ultimate Viessa's enhanced Arche, and it was reworked into a decorative helmet. Though it is only decorative, the honor and value of the Ancestors' legacy will live on.
Dominator of the Cold, Ultimate Viessa, who boasts command of an unmatched Glacial Energy.
A full-body suit that includes a storage circulator to store the excess electrical energy generated by Bunny's body so that it can be reused as a resource.
A suit specially requested by Bunny, who has always been a fan of cute things. There are no other special feature aside from its cute design.
A specially designed suit that has a neural network attached to the entire body to maximize remote control capability. Being somewhat heavy it is main disadvantage.
The suit was developed with improved visibility in the dark for nighttime operations. Jayber was directly involved in its development.

A special outfit Blair, Lepic, and Esiemo, aka the Fire Guys, gave to Jayber as a gift. As soon as he heard the name "Explosive Presence", he made a face and refused. However, Esiemo grabbed him and Lepic and Blair forced him to wear it. Unable to overcome the embarrassment, Jayber put on the helmet, which covered his entire face. The Fire Guys were, of course, very pleased.

An infiltration bio-helmet created based on DNA samples from the Vulgus Order of Truth. Designed to subvert the Vulgus' biometric authentication system, most of the DNA samples were obtained by Freyna during her mission.

After the Room 0 Incident, Freyna was quarantined for a long time for being unable to control her Arche. When the toxin in her Arche was finally neutralized, a prototype suit was made, and Freyna was released from the isolation unit.
An exclusive set of goggles for Gley based on descriptions of 'vampires' in ancient texts. Her bloodless face and cold expression inspire fear in the beholder.
After having been kidnapped by the Vulgus, various experiments left Gley neither human nor Vulgus. Her suit contains a restraint feature to keep her at bay when she's Frenzied.

A specialized mask designed for Gley who quenches her rage-induced thirst by taking her enemies' lives. It ensures that the stolen life is retained in the mouth for an extended period, minimizing thirst.
The special outfit worn by Colon Special Forces when out on operations. But for Sharen, this outfit has a number of unique gadgets specifically for her.

The Colon Special Forces' hat Sharen wore before she acquired her Arche Drive body prosthetic. Anais gave her a new suit and suggested she wear it with this hat. It's a cherished item that reminds Sharen of her life before she had to use body prosthetics.
A suit that was completed with the technical help of the Magisters to improve the burn but is often used for barbecuing.
Out on the town at night to blow some steam after his missions, Blair is often mistaken to be the Dominator of the Dark Streets, thanks to the way he dresses.
An exploration helmet developed for deep-sea Void Erosion investigations. It has been reinforced throughout to withstand high water pressure.
The suit was created at the request of Valby, after seeing a frog move between water and land and thinking it resembled her. She was happy to receive the suit from the Magisters.

This helmet was developed after the Agna Desert Operation to honor the memory of the members of the Construction Corps. The Magisters said its clunky design and simplistic features wouldn't be able to handle Kyle's Arche, but he ignored them. Contrary to the Magisters' fears, both the helmet and suit proved to be extremely stable. The skills of an experienced technician who led the Construction Corps are still on display even as a Descendant.
This special ops suit was created after Kyle and the Construction Corps were almost swept away by a sandstorm while they were trying to set up camp in the desert zone.
An outfit designed by Esiemo himself to evoke an explosion large enough to be seen from even Albion and instill terror into the Vulgus.
A specialized suit created to enhance situational awareness on the battlefield. The effort put into it to relieve Luna's alertness is abundantly apparent.
Luna always has to be the center of attention at pool parties. She emphasizes her cuteness by tying her uniquely half-bleached hair into a fluffy bun.

These unique goggles of the Ultimate gear incorporate the legacy of the Ancestors in their distinctive design. They predominantly feature the Magister's advanced technologies rather than the traditional aspects of the Ancestor's legacy. As befits an Ultimate suit, special attention has been given to conductivity and weight reduction. Inspired by the design, Bunny suggested the color for the goggles, resulting in their current pink hue.

As a token of his appreciation for birds, Enzo had a helmet built by the Magisters per his specific request. While made of extremely strong glass, the use of specialized lightweight kuiper helps reduce strain on the neck. Enzo focused on making the helmet resemble a hawk's beak.
Enzo wears this special operation goggles when he needs to focus on combat rather than supplies. Like an owl, it allows Enzo to spot where enemies are hiding swiftly and precisely.

A helmet worn during night operations and when engaging in direct battle. Integrated with a gas mask, it is equipped with multiple filters to counteract the Vulgus' toxic materials. The eye part, designed to prepare for the Vulgus' light attacks, resembles a soldier who has emerged from a nightmare.

Found in a glacial cave, this Ultimate equipment was so damaged that it was unusable. Although the restoration was almost abandoned halfway through because of the difficulty, the restoration continued upon Viessa's comment that she liked this equipment because of the design. The superalloy thorns jutting out all over the body are a distinctive feature of this equipment. The reason for them remains a mystery.

This headgear was designed specifically for Gley, who was deployed in the Vulgus Slaughter Operation. It was developed to enable the detection of sonar waves emitted by the Vulgus surveillance systems, particularly during the time when these systems intensify at sunset.
Featuring a wide application of blusher to unify all the colors and a blend of complicated hues, Bunny's image is both unique and cheery.
There's a simple scratch added to the right eyebrow. This was a big challenge for Jayber who doesn't like standing out.
When Jayber appeared with this look, everyone was shocked and brought him to Yujin. As soon as Yujin saw Jayber, he frowned and said, "You look like the Grim Reaper."
The default hairstyle for Lepic.
